records.title: GitHub Repo
records.description: Just a link to the repo where this GitHub Site is actually stored.

records.title: GitHub Profile
records.description: One level above the site repo.

records.title: Coding definition
records.description: The SARS-CoV-2 genome annotated with coding regions, gene names, proteins, amino acids and amplicons.

records.title: Undefined
records.description: Compare a SARS-CoV-2 sequence against variant definitions to find out why it does or doesn't meet those definitions.

records.title: Stargazer
records.description: Gaze at (SARS-CoV-2) constellations. Essentially the same thing as Undefined, but with Scorpio constellations.

records.title: Mpox coding definition
records.description: A fork of the SARS-CoV-2 coding def page, but for mpox instead

records.title: Codons
records.description: Really simple tool for translating a single codon.

records.title: Aliases
records.description: Complementary to the lineages list, this gives you the list of aliases for a lineage.

records.title: Call
records.description: Look up the country associated with an amateur radio callsign prefix.

records.title: Colours
records.description: A colour palette generator. Random on every page load, see if you get something nice. Used to generate the colourscheme for this page...

records.title: Sunrise/Sunset
records.description: The sun'll come out, tomorrow. But when precisely? This answers that!

records.title: Circles
records.description: Audio responsive circles. No real rhyme or reason, just for fun.

records.title: YouTube Overclocker
records.description: Enables playback speeds from 0x up to 16x on YouTube.

records.title: Grid
records.description: A homage to the System 6 desktop background pattern editor.

records.title: img2base64
records.description: Upload an image, get a base64 encoded data URI. Just a plain, straightforward implementation of a basic utility.

records.title: Stars
records.description: Fly through space like it's 1995.

records.title: dials
records.description: Analogue clock and stopwatch.

records.title: digits
records.description: Digital clock and scrolling marquee.

records.title: Eighty-twenty-five
records.description: A basic 80x25 textarea for notes. Featureless.

records.title: Orbit
records.description: Planetary orbits from an arbitrary syzygy. watchOS inspired!

records.title: Sudoku [WIP]
records.description: A work-in-progress Sudoku game. Currently just a grid that you can put numbers in...

records.title: Alphanumeric
records.description: Sort of like a railway station split-flap display, except you're allowed to play with it

records.title: Sprinkles [WIP]
records.description: Recreation of the WatchOS Pride 2023 watchface

records.title: Tone
records.description: Basic sort of musical-y thingy

records.title: Scope
records.description: Silly Lissajous figures in HTML5 canvas

records.title: ipa
records.description: IPA pronunciation guide

records.title: aoc2024
records.description: Let's have a go at Advent of Code 2024!
